Package services

Class GenericCRUDService<ENTITY,​ENTITY_DTO,​ENTITY_REPO,​ID>

java.lang.Object
services.GenericCRUDService<ENTITY,​ENTITY_DTO,​ENTITY_REPO,​ID>
Type Parameters:
ENTITY - the generic type that will be mapped to the Entity object.
ENTITY_DTO - the generic type that will be mapped to the Entity DTO object.
ENTITY_REPO - the generic Repo reference that will be mapped to the Entity associated repository.
ID - the generic type that will be mapped to the Class of the entities id; String.
Direct Known Subclasses:
CrudService
public abstract class GenericCRUDService<ENTITY,​ENTITY_DTO,​ENTITY_REPO,​ID>
extends Object
The Class GenericCRUDService.

an abstract implementation of all CRUD methods that will be extended by other services.

Kindly make sure not to add other specific methods to this generic class; Specific implementations could be added to the specific classes.

Note that these implementations could be overridden in the service implementation.
